name: rand::seq::slice::IndexedRandom::choose_multiple_weighted

cond_chains.ret:
Ok(SliceChooseIter {
            slice: self,
            _phantom: Default::default(),
            indices: index::sample_weighted(
                rng,
                self.len(),
                |idx| weight(&self[idx]).into(),
                amount,
            )?
            .into_iter(),
        })
